# Our Mission 

[SARA makes data science accessible to everyone - not just the privileged few. We provide **free** training in coding and data analysis to students, researchers, and professionals, removing barriers of cost, complexity, and background. We are empowering the next generation to transform their careers and communities through data.]{.p-mission}

::: {.button}
[Support Our Mission](donate.qmd)
